alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 10 at 7:26PM CDT until August 10 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Clay County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Webster County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Adams County in south central Nebraska... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 720 PM CDT, a funnel cloud was reported over Roseland, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Funnel cloud. SOURCE...Public confirmed funnel cloud. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * The tornado will be near... Blue Hill around 735 PM CDT. Rosemont around 745 PM CDT. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
